alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Perkins; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 02 at 1:51PM MDT until April 03 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern and southwestern South Dakota. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will be possible at times during this period, especially across northwestern South Dakota. Combined with the strong winds, this could lead to low visibilities and some slick spots on roadways.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
